titles: A treatise of ruling elders and deacons In which, these things which belong to the understanding of their office and duty, are clearly and shortly set down. By a Minister of the Church of Scotland.
author: Guthrie, James, 1612?-1661.
publisher: re-printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to their most excellent Majesties,
notes: A minister of the Church of Scotland = James Guthrie.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Church of Scotland --  Customs and practices --  Early works to 1800.
